name: Tri-Beats
description:
This game was made for a 3 hour Tri-jam with the theme: Triangles.

Match the colors quickly or your time is up!

[INFO]

There are 2 types of levels: A Timed mode and Completion mode

The timed mode gives you a certain amount of time you have to complete that level. Also, a timer will show up on the top left.

The completion mode plays the song and stops it randomly, during that time it is stopped, you cannot stop any Tribeats until the music starts playing again or its game over for you.

[CONTROLS]:

1,2,3,4,5,6 - Selects the tribeat number

Enter - Stop the certain tribeat

R - Restart level(Including tutorial level)

*When you press any of the number keys, press enter after to stop the tribeat.

I would of attempted to make more music, but I simply had no time, so I quickly composed one of the songs and added another song I made a while back. Hope you enjoy!
